00020 
00021 #pragma once
00022 
00023 #include <l4/re/dataspace>
00024 #include <l4/re/protocols>
00025 #include <l4/re/video/goos>
00026 #include <l4/re/video/goos-sys.h>
00027 
00028 #include <l4/sys/capability>
00029 #include <l4/cxx/ipc_server>
00030 
00031 
00032 namespace L4Re { namespace Util { namespace Video {
00033 
00038 class Goos_svr
00039 {
00040 protected:
00042   L4::Cap<L4Re::Dataspace> _fb_ds;
00044   L4Re::Video::Goos::Info _screen_info;
00046   L4Re::Video::View::Info _view_info;
00047 
00048 public:
00053   L4::Cap<L4Re::Dataspace> get_fb() const { return _fb_ds; }
00054 
00059   L4Re::Video::Goos::Info const *screen_info() const { return &_screen_info; }
00060 
00065   L4Re::Video::View::Info const *view_info() const { return &_view_info; }
00066 
00077   virtual int refresh(int x, int y, int w, int h)
00078   { (void)x; (void)y; (void)w; (void)h; return -L4_ENOSYS; }
00079 
00088   int dispatch(l4_umword_t obj, L4::Ipc::Iostream &ios);
00089 
00098   void init_infos()
00099   {
00100     using L4Re::Video::View;
00101 
00102     _view_info.flags = View::F_none;
00103 
00104     _view_info.view_index = 0;
00105     _view_info.xpos = 0;
00106     _view_info.ypos = 0;
00107     _view_info.width = _screen_info.width;
00108     _view_info.height = _screen_info.height;
00109     _view_info.pixel_info = _screen_info.pixel_info;
00110     _view_info.buffer_index = 0;
00111   }
00112 
00116   virtual ~Goos_svr() {}
00117 };
00118 
00119 inline
00120 int
00121 Goos_svr::dispatch(l4_umword_t, L4::Ipc::Iostream &ios)
00122 {
00123   l4_msgtag_t tag;
00124   ios >> tag;
00125 
00126   if (tag.label() != L4Re::Protocol::Goos)
00127     return -L4_EBADPROTO;
00128 
00129   unsigned idx = 0;
00130   L4::Opcode op;
00131   ios >> op;
00132   switch (op)
00133     {
00134     case L4Re::Video::Goos_::View_info:
00135       ios >> idx;
00136       if (idx != 0)
00137   return -L4_ERANGE;
00138 
00139       ios.put(_view_info);
00140       return L4_EOK;
00141     case L4Re::Video::Goos_::Info:
00142       ios.put(_screen_info);
00143       return L4_EOK;
00144     case L4Re::Video::Goos_::Get_buffer:
00145       ios >> idx;
00146       if (idx != 0)
00147   return -L4_ERANGE;
00148       ios << L4::Ipc::Snd_fpage(_fb_ds, L4_CAP_FPAGE_RW);
00149       return L4_EOK;
00150     case L4Re::Video::Goos_::View_refresh:
00151       ios >> idx;
00152       // fall through
00153     case L4Re::Video::Goos_::Screen_refresh:
00154   {
00155     int x,y,w,h;
00156     ios >> x >> y >> w >> h;
00157     if (idx != 0)
00158       return -L4_ERANGE;
00159 
00160     return refresh(x, y, w, h);
00161   }
00162     default:
00163       return -L4_ENOSYS;
00164     }
00165 }
00166 
00167 }}}
L4Re - L4 Runtime Environment
